msbt.message: Zzznyam, nyam, nyam
Mrrphbrrgh? Waiter, somebody put salt in this water Zzz
B'GUH! Who's at the helm? Justgimme five more minutes
AVAST! Storm's a-comin'! Brace yerselves, lads. ZzzHard to starboard! Tough to port? Stern tostern
Weigh anchor Check its blood pressure. Who's your provider Nyam, nyam
T-the waves The waves areguh! Ready th' pool noodles! Zzz
Nnnn, don't wanna be flotsam Can I be jetsam? It just sounds more rugged Zzz
Honk-shoo, honk-shoo Snoring sounds, et cetera
Zzz No, YOU walk th' plank, Ahab Think yer so smart. Zzz
SNRRK, snrrk Sorry, fellas. Already licked all these cookies. Had totest for raisins. Zzz

Blerrrgh D-do you have my pickled-herring pizza? I already tipped online, soWait—I don't see a pizza! Where am I? Who are you? Who am I?! Oh, hang on. I know that one.I'm none ulliver than Gulliver, a seafaring seagull of the sevenseas.Were you the one who kept nudging me just now?
Thanks for the wake-up call! Those tasty hallucinations tend to sneak up on meCan you find it in your heart to forgive this waterlogged birdbrain?I'm reading your vacant expression as a yes! Phew.

Guess I dozed off and tumbled overboard againThat's an endearing character trait of mine. My crewmates love it when I slip over the bow! HA!Don't worry. The fellas will be here to rescue me in no time. Got an ace up my wing, y'see

G-good morning! Or evening? Vision's fuzzy How are you this fine whatever-time-of-day-it-is?Say, is that my favorite landlubber, ? It is! Ahoy!Good thing your head is so huge. Makes it pretty easy to identify your blurry silhouette.Would you like to hear how I ended up on your beach THIS time? Yeah, I thought you might.

There I was, battling a dozen—no, TWO dozen sea monsters!I was holding my ownuntil one of 'em landed a devastating tickle attack. Sent me tumblin' overboard!KA-SPLOOSH! Paddle, flail, blurble-urbleNext thing I know, I'm being poked back to life on this very beach."Buoy," talk about a close call! "Canoe" believe it? HA!Uhthat's your cue to laugh. Have you heard these before?Well, I'd love to stay and chat for several more hours, but the ocean is callin' my name.Time to summon a rescue!

"But, verily, it be the nature of dreams to end"SNRRK! GUH! Who?! What? Where? And I'll throw in when and why at no extra charge! You there! What's with the rude awakening, huh? Don't you know who you're dealing with?Oh! It's you, !That's different, then. I'm SLIGHTLY less annoyed.

Hm? "What was that 'verily' stuff about?" Not sure! I think I heard a fish say it once.Anyway I guess I must've fallen overboard and washed up on this beach. It happens!Don't worry about me. Getting rescued is gonna be a breeze.

NO! Don't make me go back to space! It's cold and dark and—huh?I'mnot in space? Phew! Good ol' terra firma.Oh! It's you, ! Were you the one who jabbed me awake just now? Thanks! Also, ow!Feels like my cage got rattled pretty bad. Must've bonked the ol' noggin as I fell overboard.Maybe the pain will fade if I keep talking! HA! Ow, ooh, laughing bad. Laughing equals bad. Oof.

Will you hang with me till the hurting stops? You've got a face that screams "ample free time."So, as I was saying, I must have slipped over the side of my boat.I have no idea where my ship is right now. The crew must be worried sickNever fear. We'll be reunited in a jiffy!

Hooooo boy. Up we go. On your feet, sailor. This isn't our first mystery beach and it won't be our lastBlugh Swallowed a LOT of seawater Come on, get it together. Talk to the local. Here we go.Hello, stranger! Is this your beach? Your stubborn commitment to shoving me awake tells me yes.

Wait, I know you! You'reRusty? No! You're ! Hey! How've you been?As for me, I'm still trapped in a will-they-won't-they relationship with that flirty siren we call the seaAnd, due to an unfortunate accident that wasn't my fault—probably— I'm shipwrecked. Yes, again.Does it count as shipwrecked if I don't know where the ship is? I should probably know thisAhh, I'll figure that out later. For now, I have to call my ship and summon another rescue!
I'll just call for help using my handy-dandyuh.
M-my, uh <10_10 />OH MY GOSH!<10_9 />My handy-dandy communicator is broken! This isn't handy OR dandy!

Aww, sardines! It's all cracked and busted Looks like it's missing a few communicator parts tooThat meansI'll have to wait for my crew to find me on their own.Hmm. That could take a while. I've only got enough nautical puns to last for a couple of hours
You! Yes, you! Will you help me find my communicator parts?
I'll look for 'em.
No way!
I'm begging you here! Will you look for my communicator parts? Please?
I'll look for 'em.
No way!
Really?! Wow! I haven't gotten a reception this sweet and bubbly since I washed up at ol' Coralcola!
Oh, thank you! Thank you! Your heart must be almost as big as your head!
Oof. I haven't received a cold shoulder this icy since my brush with the Snomad fleetCome on, you have to help! It's like wise old folks always say. "Do unto others, something something"!
Really? Wow. OK, uhhmm. And I thought SPACE was coldI'm gonna have faith that this ship hasn't sailed. Maybe you'll run into those parts by accident

The communicator parts are probably buried in the sand somewhere.I'm just missing <50_8 x="0" y="0" a="parts" b="part" c="parts" />. If you'll find 'em, I'll try to cram 'em back in here! I'm sure my crewmates are looking for me, so I'd better stay here and watch for the boat. I'll leave the searching to you! I believe in you, partner! I don't have much of a choice.
If you can find <50_8 x="0" y="0" a="parts" b="part" c="parts" />, I should be able to fix my communicator. I'm counting on you, skipper!
Hey! Did you find 'em?
Got 'em right here!
Still searching

My communicator parts are definitely buried in the sand on this island's beaches. I just know it.Butif that's the case, there's nothing I can do.I had a shovel, but I sold it to buy this communicator. Curse you, fate! Why can't I win?!
My communicator parts won't be sitting out in the open. They're too cunning for thatThey must be buried in the sand somewhere. Keep your shovel handy and dig up any odd spots!
Hey, communicator parts! Come out, come out wherever you are!No answer. What gives? It's like they've clammed up all of a sudden! Buried their heads in the sand!
After you've found all of my communicator parts, just bring 'em right here! I'll do the rest.
I'm not sure how many different communicator parts are out there.I could probably cram about of them in here. Then it might work again!
Oh! That's them! Those are definitely my communicator parts! C'mere, you little troublemakers
Alright, the pieces are crammed back in here. Let's see if this thing can send a message.

You're the best! Thanks for all your help. I promise to return the favor.Be sure to check your mail in a few days. I'm gonna send you somethin' that'll knock your flippers off!Just make sure you put some flippers on before you open it, OK?
Ahhh, I'm saved! Nothin' to do now but pace back and forth for the next few hours. Better get started!
Ahoy there, crew! It's me, your brudder from anudder rudder!So listenit happened again. Can you swing by to pick me up?Sending my coordinates now. Gulliver, over and out!There! That should do it.
As long as my communicator works again, everything will be alright.
Alright, I should receive a reply from them anytime now.
I sent a quick heads-up to my shipmates.
Let's see here No replies yet
It says they read my message I'll bet they're just busy planning my return celebration. Writing my name on a big banner, breaking out the GOOD soda yeah, that's gotta be it!
This little check mark means they definitely saw my message, right? Yeah. I'm sure they're en route.
I bet my shipmates are already on their way over here! It says they read my message Yep. Aaaaany minute now.
Hrmmmmph Nope. Nuh-uh. Justlemme sleep

Ahoy there! I'm a sailor traveling the seven seas. Call me Gulliver!Maybe we'll cross paths again someday! No way of knowing but that's how travel works.You just hold your breath, tumble overboard, and hope for the best!

Hello! I'm Gulliver, the well-traveled sailor! Are you a visitor here? Neat! So am I.We're like two ships passing in the night, eh? I must seem so mysterious and interestingBetter soak it up now. I'll end up on your island sooner or laterand the illusion will be shattered.
This island seems pretty neat! What's your island like?Wait! Don't tell me. I want it to be a surprise. I'm sure I'll wash up on— err, VISIT it sooner or later.
Hmm. My ship should have arrived by now. Must be stuck in traffic!
Scanning the ol' horizon. It's just sea, sea, and more sea as far as the eye cansee. Y'see?
Say, how did YOU wind up here? Are you marooned too? You do have the wild eyes of a castaway
Mrmph
Oh! Ahoy! You're that skipper from earlier, right? Thanks for the wake-up call.
I was just, uh, keeping an eye out for my shipmates when I was hit by a waveof the sleepies.
Well, dock my boat! You found one of my missing communicator parts!Thanks for helping! I'll take that sneaky little part off your hands
Well, dock my boat! You found more of my missing communicator parts!Thanks for helping! I'll take those sneaky little parts off your hands

Can't believe I managed to send a message without all the parts shoved back in here.These must be some kind of bonus parts or something. Maybe they'll give my communicator superpowers!Yeah! I'll bet this baby can send funny gifs all the way to Mars now! Thanks and thanks again, skipper.

I managed to get my communicator working with the parts you dug upBut it's still kind of busted. It won't even play my games anymore!I'm guessing there are more parts hiding out there, but Hey! Wait!You have another communicator part on you, right? I can sense it!

I managed to get my communicator working with the parts you dug upBut it's still kind of busted. It won't even play my games anymore!I'm guessing there are more parts hiding out there, but Hey! Wait!You have more communicator parts on you, right? I can sense it!
This is great! More parts means this thing will be back to normal in no time!Thanks and thanks again, skipper!
Oh! Hi! Thanks for waking me up. Blech! Mouth tastes like sand
I'm Gulliver, a salty sailor scouring these seven seas, see?
More specifically, I was scouring this beach for somethingbut I guess I wore myself out and fell asleep.

You look confused. Let me back up. See, I was sailing with my crew, fell overboard, and washed up here!Sail, fail, wash up and tell the tale. It's a recurring thing with me.But this timemy handy-dandy communicator got busted up. Now I can't call for a rescue!I'll need to find a few missing communicator parts to get this gizmo back to shipshape.Those tricky little parts are buried in the sand somewhere. Will you help me find 'em?
I'll look for 'em.
No way!
My brain was seriously overloaded. Got a lot going on. Thought a power nap might fit the bill, y'know?

You look confused. Let me back up. See, I was sailing with my crew, fell overboard, and washed up here!Sail, fail, wash up and tell the tale. It's a recurring thing with me.But this time, my communicator was busted! I was doomed! Cursed to wander this adorable island forever!That's when a kindhearted soul showed upand recovered all of my missing communicator parts!Thanks to them, I'll be shippin' out of here in no time.
Yep. Should be getting a response from my crew any minute now
Wait. What? <10_10 />OHMIGOSH!<10_9 />My trusty communicator is busted! AGAIN!Those parts must have come loose during my nap! The waves probably carried them off! Dirty traitors!
As long as this thing is busted, I won't be able to get any messages from my crew!The parts must be buried in the sand somewhere on this island. Can you help me find them? Please?!
I'll look for 'em.
No way!
I was, uh, just taking a quick power nap. Getting un-stranded is really exhausting, y'know?Please keep searching for my missing communicator parts! I know they're here somewhere.
A generous, heroic local found all of my missing communicator parts!This island is overflowing with friendly skippers! It's enough to make a salty seabird swoon.
With my mind finally at ease, the exhaustion took hold. Hit me like a fancy yacht doing 40 knots.I'm not ashamed to say, I passed right out!
Now that I'm upright and back to full blabbin' strength, I really should contact my shipmates.

Thanks to the cruel whims of that smug jerk we call fate, I can't get any messages from my crew!The missing parts must be buried in the sand on these beaches. You've gotta help me find 'em!The ship has sailed on saying no, so don't let me down, skipper! Please?
Oh! It's you again.I'm, uh, still dealing with my little dilemma here. Haven't been able to leave yet, obviously.
I'm Gulliver, an eager sailor who'd love to have an adventure that doesn't start with "mis" someday.

Take today's epic tale, for instance! Thrown from my ship, I was! Washed up on this fair island.It gets more harrowing from there! My communicator got all busted up, so I can't contact my ship.If I could just find my missing communicator parts, I might be able to fix it, butthe waves must have left the poor things buried in the sand on these quaint little beaches.

Oh well. All I can do now is hope that these are the self-combing kinds of beaches. Wait! I have a better idea!Can you spare a minute to watch a broken seabird beg? Great. Ahem.PLEASE help me! You've gotta find my missing parts so I can get off this accursed, yet cozy island!

What's my sad tale, you're probably dying to ask? I was thrown from my boat and washed up on this island!I lost a few communicator parts in the aftermath, so I couldn't call my crew for help. BUT THEN
Oh! You're the skipper from before!
Let's see Should be getting a response from my crew aaaany minute now.
Yep. A happy reply from my happy shipmates on this happy, perfectly functioning little
Er, huh? <10_10 />OHMIGOSH!<10_9 />My trusty communicator is broken AGAIN! How? Why?!
I'll never find my way back at this rate! I must be missing even more communicator parts than I thoughtWill you do this sorry sailor a solid and search for my missing parts? Pretty pleeease?
